_source.text: 5. 2nd Generation Cephalosporins (Cephamycins): Cefoxitin, Cefotetan - beware increasing resistance of Bacteroides (Cefoxitin is better than Cefotetan, but avoid both for serious intraabdominal infections)

text: of Bacteroides (**Cefoxitin** **is** **better** **than** **Cefotetan**, but avoid both for serious intraabdominal infections)
